column4: i waited and tried to do this for over 4 hours. all i wanted to do was put an mp3 on my ipad. i bought the mp3 if you're wondering. damn apple is running some serious game, i honestly didn't expect it to be so hard. but i remember trying to do this same shit. just add an mp3 to my ipod.
how is apple's structure so hardcore?
the s word is not family friendly. Please stop using it.
